mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diaries (user_id, challenge_id, title, register_date, weather, feeling, content, is_public) VALUES (#{userId}, #{challengeId}, #{title}, NOW(), #{weather}, #{feeling}, #{content}, #{isPublic})
mapper.select: SELECT diary_id FROM diaries WHERE user_id = #{userId} and challenge_id = #{challengeId} ORDER BY register_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary_images (diary_id, image_index, image) VALUES (#{diaryId}, #{index}, #{imageOrTag})
INSERT INTO tags (diary_id, tag_index, hash_tag) VALUES (#{diaryId}, #{index}, #{imageOrTag})
mapper.select: SELECT diary_id diaryId, user_id userId, challenge_id challengeId, title title, register_date registerDate, weather weather, feeling feeling, content content, hit hit, is_public isPublic FROM diaries WHERE diary_id = #{diaryId} LIMIT 1
SELECT image FROM diary_images WHERE diary_id = #{diaryId} ORDER BY image_index
SELECT hash_tag FROM tags WHERE diary_id = #{diaryId} ORDER BY tag_index
